title: What is Trello: Learn Features, Uses & More | Trello
content: Your productivity powerhouse Welcome to Trello, the ultimate tool for getting things done. Whether you're managing daily to-dos, setting personal goals, or organizing your life, Trello helps you focus on what matters most and always stay on top of your game. Join a community of millions of users globally who are using Trello to get more done. Your to-dos, organized Stay organized and efficient with Inbox, Boards, and Planner. Every to-do, idea, or responsibility—no matter how small—finds its place, keeping you at the top of your game. Inbox When it’s on your mind, it goes in your Inbox. Capture your to-dos from anywhere, anytime. Boards Your to-do list may be long, but it can be manageable! Keep tabs on everything from "to-dos to tackle" to "mission accomplished!” Planner Drag, drop, get it done. Snap your top tasks into your calendar and make time for what truly matters. Inbox When it’s on your mind, it goes in your Inbox. Capture your to-dos from anywhere, anytime. Boards Your to-do list may be long, but it can be manageable! Keep tabs on everything from "to-dos to tackle" to "mission accomplished!” Planner Drag, drop, get it done. Snap your top tasks into your calendar and make time for what truly matters. Simplify your to-do list Trello cards keep all of your important information organized and accessible in one place. Add due dates, attach files, and mark to-do’s as “Done” when completed. Plus, AI helps you refine your text for a polished finish! Due dates Due dates go hand-in-hand with staying organized. In Trello, they’re easy to set, hard to miss (with reminders!), and oh-so-satisfying to mark as “done.” Attachments No more digging through endless email chains to find attachments. Just drag and drop them onto a card so the right files stay with the right tasks. Checklists Your best tool to overpower overwhelming asks. Break big tasks into small ones, check things off the list, and watch that status bar go to 100% complete. Powered by AI Harness the power of AI. Brainstorm new ideas, organize action items, and condense lengthy texts instantly with AI Simplify your workflow and stay on top of your to-dos effortlessly! Integrate seamlessly with the apps and services your team relies on like Slack, Microsoft Teams, Outlook, Gmail, Confluence, and hundreds more. And if you use Jira, you can seamlessly sync and manage your tasks right within Trello using Jira Lists. Learn more > Unlock your potential with Trello Experience a new level of efficiency and productivity with Trello. Your work, your way Need to structure information on Trello cards specific to the task at hand? Custom Fields lets you do all that and more— providing process and formality to your workflow to meet your unique needs. Automate your workflow Create a foolproof process for moving work forward with Trello’s built-in automation system. Run commands and set automated rules for almost any action in Trello so that you can focus on what matters most. Learn more > Get peace of mind Easily manage users in real-time and control content-management permissions with just a few clicks.
